name: places/ChIJH4GkW6ZZwokR9TZqm6sXzXQ
formattedAddress: 7 E 27th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 E 27th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Refined hotel offering chic quarters & weekly socials, plus an exercise room, a deli & a trendy bar.

originalText.text: We really loved our stay at The Evelyn! All of the staff that we encountered were so helpful and top notch! Our room had everything that we needed, and the heated tile floor was such a nice touch during our chilly-weather visit! It was also very nice that we could open the windows in the bathroom so it didn't stay steamy after showers (my biggest pet peeve when some restrooms aren't ventilated!). The decor in the hotel is really inviting and stylish and we really enjoyed the wine hour in the lobby! We will definitely stay here again on our next visit!

text.text: We really loved our stay at The Evelyn! All of the staff that we encountered were so helpful and top notch! Our room had everything that we needed, and the heated tile floor was such a nice touch during our chilly-weather visit! The decor in the hotel is really inviting and stylish and we really enjoyed the wine hour in the lobby! We will definitely stay here again on our next visit!

originalText.text:
What a lovely hotel just around the corner from the Empire State Building!
There’s really nothing to fault here, from the beautiful lobby, friendly reception team, efficient maid service. Rooms are stylish and clean- and quiet! Such a great place to stay in New York city. It was my friend’s birthday and guest relations helped arrange a little surprise for her - which was so incredibly nice. Seems like everyone enjoys working at the hotel and it shows, as guests we loved staying there! Even accidentally made it to Monday night’s happy hour for some wine- fabulous!

The recently opened Tusk bar is a wonderful addition to Evelyn Nomad - such a stylish bar with a fabulous cocktail menu. I would say the only thing missing from this hotel being a true luxury 5* experience is a proper sit-down, hot-meal breakfast- but I’ve heard they are planning to open a brasserie, as well as a restaurant- so Evelyn will only get better with time and I already can’t wait to come back!

originalText.text:
Great Hotel, every interaction with hotel staff was friendly and attentive.

Tusk bar was a treat Jo the bartender was wonderful, she made our time hanging out fun. She was engaging helpful with suggestions and really sweet.

Hotel is stunning and so conveniently located to everything would want to go. Took over as my favorite hotel in the city. Definitely will be back.

originalText.text: We stayed at the Evelyn the week before Christmas and the experience was nothing short of wonderful. The hotel is perfectly located, especially when it's your first visit to the city and you're planning on exploring the major landmarks. The hotel itself is stunning. The mid-century modern decor is beautiful and the hotel is kept very clean. The staff were all friendly and professional; Amal in particular went above and beyond to make our visit special. We were lucky enough to be there for the restaurant's/bar's opening night, and to no surprise that was also an amazing experience. The food and drink exceeded our expectations, and we enjoyed our evening socializing with the bartenders. The rooms were a good size, especially in Manhattan, and the bed was comfortable. Finally, the breakfast was another pleasant part of our visit . We were offered a variety of options, complimentary with our stay, all of which were a delicious way to start our day. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting New York City, and I hope that I can come back again soon, to have another amazing experience!

originalText.text: What a wonderful little hotel in NYC! Staff was friendly and helpful, the rooms were about the size you'd expect - small but with a comfy bed and just enough room to keep luggage in the room, and the location made it easy to get to popular places on foot or by subway. The coffee and breakfast options at the cafe were plentiful and delicious. I would definitely stay here again!
